- we're designing p2p optimizations to enable peer-wise cell-level reconciliation when gossiping columns
- ideally, these will be optional optimisations that don't require a fork (can be deployed between Fusaka and Glamsterdam)
- for this to work, we had identified a few tweaks needed in getBlobs:
  - reversing the getBlobsV2 change so that getBlobs can still return partial responses
  - making getBlobsV2 return the extended blobs; since the EL is erasure coding anyway to verify cell proofs in type 3 transactions, the CL can reuse that work if the EL is willing to cache it until inclusion or tx drop (this would effectively double the blobpool footprint on disk)
- just wanted to gauge sentiment here before we submit spec changes
